Literature.Title: Potent antimicrobial peptides with selectivity for Bacillus anthracis over human erythrocytes.
Literature.Author: Dawson RM, Fox MA, Atkins HS, Liu CQ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K91BK(MIC=100µM),Escherichia coli K91BK(IC50=70.7µM),Bacillus subtilis var. niger ATCC 9372(MIC=2.21±0.19µM),Bacillus subtilis var. niger ATCC 9372(IC50=1.31±0.10µM),Bacillus anthracis Sterne 34F2(MIC=25µM),Bacillus anthracis Sterne 34F2(IC50=17.7µM),Burkholderia thailandensis ATCC 700388(no activity data)
